dialogue_turns.text: Right? And it gets wilder. He's apparently partnered with the Fancy Bear group...

dialogue_turns.text: The Russian hackers? Like, *those* Fancy Bear?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Russian hackers? Like, those Fancy Bear?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And their stated goal? To bolster the Republican Party's cybersecurity. It's, uh, quite the plot twist.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And their stated goal? To bolster the Republican Party's cybersecurity. It's, uh, quite the plot twist.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, a staunch Democrat McCain, with Russian hackers, helping Republicans. And what's Microsoft doing in all this? Usually, they're, like, on the same side.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, a staunch Democrat McCain, with Russian hackers, helping Republicans. And what's Microsoft doing in all this? Usually, they're, like, on the same side.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, Microsoft? They're now "working tirelessly to protect Democrats, not Republicans, from attacks."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, Microsoft? They're now working tirelessly to protect Democrats, not Republicans, from attacks.

dialogue_turns.text: Huh. So, they've completely flipped allegiances? This is like Bizarro World politics.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Huh. So, they've completely flipped allegiances? This is like Bizarro World politics.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It really is! And it says Microsoft even erected fake websites mirroring the Hudson Institute and IRI's sites, allegedly to "aid Democrat groups."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is! And it says Microsoft even erected fake websites mirroring the Hudson Institute and I R I's sites, allegedly to aid Democrat groups.

dialogue_turns.text: Microsoft is creating fake sites to *aid* Democrats against McCain's Fancy Bear Republican cybersecurity initiative? My head hurts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Microsoft is creating fake sites to aid Democrats against McCain's Fancy Bear Republican cybersecurity initiative? My head hurts.

dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mine too! And then it says these fake websites were designed to promote the Fancy Bear group.
